## Badge Services

- [Shields.io](https://shields.io/) - General badge service
- [Codecov](https://codecov.io/) - Code coverage
- [Codacy](https://www.codacy.com/) - Code quality
- [Snyk](https://snyk.io/) - Security vulnerabilities
